meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>cross</radical> for a <radical>drunkard</radical>'s <radical>car</radical>, to <kanji>place on</kanji> its dashboard. Drunkards should not drive, and when you <kanji>put on</kanji> a cross, it prevents the car from starting!
readingMnemonic: You have a lot of crosses to <kanji>place on</kanji> drunkard cars, so you get your <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい) to do it for you. The cyborg doesn't need sleep, so it can patrol the streets 24/7 for the sake of public safety. What a saintly cyborg.
